page.title: 13CANDY VALLEY. POPULATION .
page.content:
WHERE THE MORDA RIVER RUNS THROUGH THE VALLEY IT IS KNOWN AS THE CANDY BROOK. EIGHTEEN HOUSES, SCATTERED ON BOTH SIDES OF THE BROOK MAKE UP THE HAMLET OF CANDY.
UP TO 1975 THE POPULATION HAD BEEN STEADILY FALLING YEAR BY YEAR BUT IN THE LAST TEN YEARS IT HAS GRADUALLY INCREASED. IN 1985 THERE ARE 32 ADULTS AND 7 CHILDREN. THREE OF THE CHILDREN WERE BORN IN THE LAST THREE YEARS.
ONCE THE HOUSES BELONGED TO THE WYNSTAY ESTATE BUT NOW THEY ARE ALL OWNER OCCUPIED.
FORMERLY THE MAIN OCCUPATIONS FOR THE MEN OF THE VALLEY WERE ON FARMS OR ON THE NEARBY LIVERPOOL WATERWORKS. THE WOMEN STAYED AT HOME.
